title: Sania expresses satisfaction over NADRA arrangements for Ehsaas beneficiaries
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 4 (APP):Special Assistant to the Prime Minister on Social Protection Dr Sania Nishtar on Monday visited the NADRA Mega Center here and expressed satisfaction over the arrangements made to facilitate the visitors and the services for Ehsaas Programme beneficiaries.
National Database and Registration Authority (NADRA) Chairman Usman Mobin was also present on the occasion.
The special Assistant thanked the chairman for solving the issue of biometric verification of Ehsaas Programme beneficiaries by opening the NADRA centers.
